text: Interstate 465 (I-465), also known as the USS Indianapolis Memorial Highway, is the beltway circling Indianapolis, Indiana, United States. It has a perimeter of approximately . It lies almost completely within the boundaries of Marion County. It intersects with I-65, I-69, I-70, and I-74, and provides additional access to I-65 via I-865. ==References== Category:Interstate Highways
title: Interstate 465
